question: Which of the following crops is a tropical monsoon crop?
explanation: The Kharif crop is the summer crop or monsoon crop in India. Major Kharif crops of India include Millets (Bajra & Jowar), Cotton, Soybean, Sugarcane, Turmeric, Paddy (Rice), Maize, Moong (Pulses), Groundnut, Red Chilies, etc.
